plants.name: Monstera Deliciosa
plants.care_notes: Wipe leaves regularly. Allow top two inches of soil to dry out between waterings. High humidity preferred.

plants.name: Snake Plant (Sansevieria)
plants.care_notes: Very drought tolerant. Water sparingly, especially in winter. Avoid getting water in the rosette.

plants.name: Pothos (Golden)
plants.care_notes: Easy to care for. Water when leaves start to droop slightly. Can tolerate some neglect.

plants.name: ZZ Plant (Zamioculcas zamiifolia)
plants.care_notes: Extremely drought tolerant. Water thoroughly but infrequently. Prone to root rot if overwatered.

plants.name: Fiddle Leaf Fig (Ficus lyrata)
plants.care_notes: Sensitive to changes. Water when top few inches of soil are dry. Rotate regularly for even growth.

plants.name: African Violet
plants.care_notes: Water from the bottom. Avoid getting water on leaves to prevent spots. High humidity.

plants.name: Spider Plant (Chlorophytum comosum)
plants.care_notes: Easy to care for. Produces 'spiderettes' that can be propagated. Tolerates some neglect.

plants.name: Aloe Vera
plants.care_notes: Allow soil to dry completely between waterings. Use well-draining soil. Medicinal properties.

plants.name: Peace Lily (Spathiphyllum)
plants.care_notes: Will droop dramatically when thirsty. Water thoroughly. Good air purifier.

plants.name: Rubber Plant (Ficus elastica)
plants.care_notes: Wipe leaves to keep them shiny. Water when the top inch or two of soil is dry. Avoid overwatering.
